DECEMBER 8, 2015
ADIDAS ULTRA BOOST (MAGMA GRADIENT)

“These are just adidas that are fresh, they’re not even my shoes. I don’t even get paid to wear ’em”. That’s what Yeezus West had to say about the Ultra Boost in his lecture at the School of the Art Institute of Chicago last month. And you can’t fault him, the Ultra Boost is indeed fresh. Especially when it’s upper is given a gradient colourway like these volcanic-looking Boosts here. We first saw this shoe when adidas showed their upcoming colourways in October, and it was definitely the loudest of the pack. With a deep red that transitions to a near-orange as it’s gradient changes over the upper, this Boost comes out looking like an inverted bunch of these guys:
